name: CataclysmicJeopardy
description:
“Cataclysmic Run” is a 2D platformer about a human who has been chosen to compete in an intergalactic parkour game show to prove the worth of the human race to the rest of the universe.

Cataclysmic: relating to or denoting a violent natural event, or used to emphasize the extent of something bad or unwelcome.

Fail a part of the course and a piece of the world blows up before your eyes, succeed in the obstacle courses and the alien mother-ship you’re aboard will fall apart.

CONTROLS:
A/D = left/right movement
W/S = climb up/down
Space = Jump
